org.apache.ambari.server.stack

Class StackManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.stack.StackManager

  • public class StackManager
extends Object
    Manages all stack related behavior including parsing of stacks and providing access to stack information.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StackManager

        public StackManager(File stackRoot,
                    @Nullable
                    File commonServicesRoot,
                    @Nullable
                    File extensionRoot,
                    OsFamily osFamily,
                    boolean validate,
                    MetainfoDAO metaInfoDAO,
                    ActionMetadata actionMetadata,
                    StackDAO stackDao,
                    ExtensionDAO extensionDao,
                    ExtensionLinkDAO linkDao,
                    AmbariManagementHelper helper)
             throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Constructor. Initialize stack manager.
        Parameters:
        stackRootDir - stack root directory
        commonServicesRoot - common services root directory
        extensionRoot - extensions root directory
        osFamily - the OS family read from resources
        metaInfoDAO - metainfo DAO automatically injected
        actionMetadata - action meta data automatically injected
        stackDao - stack DAO automatically injected
        extensionDao - extension DAO automatically injected
        linkDao - extension link DAO automatically injected
        helper - Ambari management helper automatically injected
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if an exception occurs while processing the stacks

      • parseDirectories

        protected void parseDirectories(File stackRoot,
                                File commonServicesRoot,
                                File extensionRoot)
                         throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Throws:

      • getStack

        public StackInfo getStack(String name,
                          String version)
        Obtain the stack info specified by name and version.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the stack
        version - version of the stack
        Returns:
        The stack corresponding to the specified name and version. If no matching stack exists, null is returned.

      • getStacks

        public Collection<StackInfo> getStacks(String name)
        Obtain all stacks for the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - stack name
        Returns:
        A collection of all stacks with the given name. If no stacks match the specified name, an empty collection is returned.

      • getStacksByName

        public Map<String,List<StackInfo>> getStacksByName()
        Obtain all a map of all stacks by name.
        Returns:
        A map of all stacks with the name as the key.

      • getStacks

        public Collection<StackInfo> getStacks()
        Obtain all stacks.
        Returns:
        collection of all stacks

      • getExtension

        public ExtensionInfo getExtension(String name,
                                  String version)
        Obtain the extension info specified by name and version.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the extension
        version - version of the extension
        Returns:
        The extension corresponding to the specified name and version. If no matching stack exists, null is returned.

      • getExtensions

        public Collection<ExtensionInfo> getExtensions(String name)
        Obtain all extensions for the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - extension name
        Returns:
        A collection of all extensions with the given name. If no extensions match the specified name, an empty collection is returned.

      • getExtensions

        public Collection<ExtensionInfo> getExtensions()
        Obtain all extensions.
        Returns:
        collection of all extensions

      • haveAllRepoUrlsBeenResolved

        public boolean haveAllRepoUrlsBeenResolved()
        Determine if all tasks which update stack repo urls have completed.
        Returns:
        true if all of the repo update tasks have completed; false otherwise
